mapper.insert: insert into stockincomerecord (stockOprationBill_id, number, amount, auditor) values (#{stockOprationBillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, stockOprationBill_id, number, amount, auditor from stockincomerecord
